answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello, 
I found some examples of the local media/ press kits.
The link below goes to the media kit home page for the City of Plantation, FL. It includes documents about the city in general and as a tourist destination.
http://www.plantation.org/Plantation/media-kit.html
I found a similar list of documents for Calvert County, MD which you can see below.
http://www.ecalvert.com/content/mediapress/factsheets/index.asp
Also in Fairfax County, VA their Economic Development Authority has a detailed press kit. 
http://www.fairfaxcountyeda.org/press-kit
The Minnesota Department of Employment and Economic Development has a list of fact sheets describing the benefits of working in the state.
http://www.positivelyminnesota.com/Newsroom/Media_Kit/DEED_Fact_Sheets/index.aspx
There is similar kit available on the Metro Orlando Economic Development Commission website.
http://www.orlandoedc.com/News/Press-Kit/
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Pamela Muse
text:
Douglas County, NV is looking for examples of media/press kits used by other counties to provide a general overview of the community, and/or economic development information.  
Whatever examples you can provide are appreciated!
Lisa Granahan
Economic Vitality Manager
Douglas County, NV
(775) 782-6268
lgranahan@co.douglas.nv.us
title: Community Information - Media/Press Kits
